ygData.subject: Shadowknight Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All, This is my first post to the list and I have only recently become interested in the ShadowKnight class. I started an Erudite SK with a vision of a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All,
This is my first post to the list and I have only recently become
interested in the ShadowKnight class.
I started an Erudite SK with a vision of a shield and sword combo. I'm
learning that starting a character
with a vision can be quite disappointing! My efforts to find a nifty
magical sword (1H Slash) have actually
been the thing that has met with disappointment, the character himself is
quite interesting and fun to
play/ role-play. At any rate, I was wondering if I am just overlooking
something.... Are there ANY 1H Slash
SK specific weapons that don't come from the Planes? I have been watching
reports come out Kunark,
and it would seem that NPCs there are only capable of dropping 2H Slash or
2H Blunt weapons
(perhaps only a SLIGHT exaggeration :) ). Failing SK specific weapons,
what would the recommendation be?
...and sadly, a SS:Ykesha is going to be quite out of my grasp for a
while....


Thanks,
Azamai Ebontide
of Solusek Ro
